document_data.name: Nelinarian, Tansmith
document_data.mainbody: '''Nelinarian Tansmith''' was a [[truenamer]]. He led one of the study groups in the [[House of the Unnamed]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Besides his maturing [[truenamer]] skills, he had some experience as a [[fighter]].
document_data.Activities: As of {{yearlink|1373}}, he led a study group on [[truespeak]].
document_data.Relationships: He was one of the study group leaders in the [[House of the Unnamed]].
